msContents.summary: The commentary of Menahem Recanati on the Pentateuch.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script, unpunctuated, of approximately 15th century.

binding.p: BM in-house binding of ivory leather. Gilt edges. Spine title: 'R. Menachem Rekanati. Comment. in Pentateuchum. Hebr. Brit. Mus. Jure Emptionis. 19,946 Emptionis. Boxed.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Adolphus Asher (b. 1800, d. 1853), Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum 1841-1853 (see 131-153): purchased from him on 12 August 1854 (back flyleaf ii verso).
